title.narrative: GOVERNANCE AND SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Governance and Systems, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Transparency In Information And Official Documents. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) Support
